The seminar discusses huge variety of topics of students' choice in the area of wireless mobile communication. Every semester, a more specific scope of the seminar is selected (e.g., traffic management in the LTE networks, green wireless networking,
etc.). Within this technical scope, students are invited to provide their own proposals of interesting problems they would like to work on in the seminar. The main tasks students are expected to fulfill include: identification of the most important out
of recent research works that are related to the seminar topic, classification of collected research articles according to a well-motivated taxonomy, identification of the most important open issues to be solved, and view on further research directions.
We organize this course on-site. Please help us running the course as smooth as possible by regularly checking your emails, posting questions to the
first, helping fellow students answering their questions, and seriously studying at home the provided material.
